titleStmt.title: Authority list of Athena Ruby characters in SigiDoc

publicationStmt.authority: ANR/DFG DigiByzSeal - Unlocking the Hidden Value of Seals: New Methodologies for Historical Research in Byzantine Studies

item.gloss: uni2E09, variant no. 0 (Ancient punctuation, indicating omitted letters. Shaped like s)
uni2E09.1, variant no. 1 (Like a comma, midheight)
uni2E09.3, variant no. 3 (As uni2E09, set between x-height and ascender line)
uni2E09.4, variant no. 4 (As uni2E09, at baseline)
uni002F, variant no. 0 (Large slash, climbing to right)
uni002F.1, variant no. 1 (Large slash, climbing to right, curved)
uni02C1 (Like backwards, tilted question mark without dot)
uni02D9 (Pellet centered above letter. Sits between letters)
uni2E23, variant no. 0 (Connects to combining overline)
uni2E23.1, variant no. 1 (Wavy variant. Connects to combining overline)
uni0305 (Overbar. Ancient editorial mark set above previous letter(s) to mark suspension of letters)
uni0374, variant no. 0 (Like acute accent, but does not combine with other characters)
with short crossbar bisecting top arm.
One horizontal ray trisected by two short vertical rays
Set in octagonal array (no ray assigned to horizontal “axis”)
Set in hexagonal array, one “axis” set vertically.
Small rays set windmill fashion, unconnected.
Two pairs of closely placed horizontal rays, framing a central element.
Two pellets just below x-height, near each other, set horizontally.
Three pellets set in shape of equilateral triangle, pointing up.
Set in octagonal array (no pellets assigned to horizontal “axis”)
Set in hexagonal array, one “axis” set vertically.
with center pellet larger than the others.
8-pellet array set in hollow square formation.
tendril, two leaves, stem on right.
tendril, three leaves, stem on right.
cross, mid-point, arms of equal length.
first quarter moon, hollow, waxing moon.
last quarter moon, as first quarter moon, mirrored.
lazy quarter moon, as first quarter moon, but lying on side.
Thin moon on side, with pellet in middle.
6-ray star instead of pellet in middle.
Three-wave decoration with interspersed pellets. Set mid-height.
Left half of nimbus. Large C, with two pairs of horizontal lines (one at top, one at bottom); in the center is a single pellet.
Left half of nimbus. Large C, with two pairs of horizontal lines (one at top, one at bottom); in the center is a 5-pellet array.
pendilium, one pellet dangling from vertical stem.
pendilium, two pellets vertically arranged dangling from vertical stem.
pendilium, two pellets arranged diagonally dangling from left of vertical stem.
pendilium, three pellets vertically arranged dangling from vertical stem.
pendilium, three pellets in triangular formation dangling from vertical stem, two dots over one.
pendilium, three pellets in triangular formation dangling from vertical stem, pointing left.
pendilium, three pellets on baseline dangling from branched vertical stem.
Modern editorial character, full stop, used to mark a lost character
